ctx: intros d s c tl l e l0 H.
exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "d", "l" and "tl" leads to a term fun (d0 : preDTA) (l1 : prec_list) (tl0 : term_list) => MapGet prec_list s c = Some l1 -> dt_non_empty_def_2 d0 l1 tl0 l0 -> term_high (app c tl0) <= S H0 -> st_non_empty (power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d0) (map_mini state d0) H0) s = true which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "dt_non_empty_def_2" of type "forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait d p t -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "d0" : "preDTA" "l1" : "prec_list" "tl0" : "term_list" "l0" : "liste_reconnait d l tl" The 4th term has type "liste_reconnait d l tl" which should be coercible to "liste_reconnait d0 l1 tl0".

original: intros d s c tl l e l0 H. intros H0. induction l0; intros H1. - auto. - apply H. apply IHl0. apply dt_non_empty_def_2 with (d:=d) (p:=l) (t:=tl); auto.
